link.title: CPISD - COVID-19 - ANNOUNCEMENTS - ANUNCIOS

");}).call(this);

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 45px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: TEA Public Service Announcement - Anuncio de servicio pblico de TEA

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: English

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: CDC now recommends you wear a mask in public where you cant avoid being near people, like in grocery stores, pharmacies & healthcare settings

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . Remember though, your local authorities may have already issued a specific order re: masks. #StayHomeTexas

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Espaol

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: CDC recomienda que use una mscara en pblico donde no pueda evitar estar cerca de personas, como en supermercados, farmacias y centros de salud https://bit.ly/2V8o5Y2. Es posible que sus autoridades locales ya hayan hecho obligatorio el uso de mscaras. #StayHomeTexas

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: English

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The virus lives in tiny droplets in the lungs of people w/ COVID-19, even when they dont show symptoms. We can breathe the same air as anyone within abt. 6 ft. of us. Staying farther apart from people during this time reduces the chance of breathing in the virus. #StayHomeTexas

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Espaol

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: El virus vive en gotas en los pulmones de personas con COVID-19, y a veces no tienen sntomas. Puedes respirar el mismo aire que cualquiera a 6 pies de ti. Mantente ms alejado de las personas durante este tiempo para reducir la posibilidad de respirar el virus. #StayHomeTexas

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: English

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Coughing & sneezing can send tiny infected droplets into the air which can be inhaled by anyone within 6 feet of us. Always cough or sneeze into a tissue or your elbow and immediately wash your hands to lessen the risk of spreading the virus. Be smart. Stay well! #StayHomeTexas

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Espaol

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Toser y estornudar puede llevar gotas infectadas al aire, que pueden ser inhaladas por personas que esten a 6 pies de ti. Siempre tosa o estornude en pauelos desechables o en el codo y lvese las manos para disminuir la propagacin del virus. Mantente sano! #StayHomeTexas

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: English

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: By staying apart for the time being, DISTRICT is working to ensure that we are limiting the spread of COVID-19 in our community. In service of this, I want to share a one-minute video that reminds us of the most important actions we can take as individuals to reduce risk for ourselves and others:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Practice social distancing

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Wash your hands

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Stay home as much as you can, especially if you have a cough, fever, or shortness of breath

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: I encourage you to watch this video with your family. And be sure to share it with family and friends on social media and via email.

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Even though we are currently apart, we look forward to coming back together as a community soon.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Best,

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Center Point ISD

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Espaol

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Al mantenerse separados por el momento, DISTRICT est trabajando para garantizar que estamos limitando la propagacin de COVID-19 en nuestra comunidad. Al servicio de esto, quiero compartir un video de un minuto que nos recuerda las acciones ms importantes que podemos tomar como individuos para reducir el riesgo para nosotros y para los dems:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Practique el distanciamiento social.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Lvese las manos.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Qudese en casa tanto como pueda, especialmente si tiene tos, fiebre o falta de aire.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Le animo a que vea este video con su familia. Y asegrese de compartirlo con familiares y amigos en las redes sociales y por correo electrnico

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Aunque actualmente estamos separados, esperamos volver pronto como comunidad.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Lo mejor, Center Point ISD

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: English

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: #COVID19 lives in the lungs of people with the virus, even if they dont have symptoms. If you cant stay home, wear a mask, stay 6 feet apart, and wash hands.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Espaol

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: #COVID19 vive en los pulmones de las personas con el virus, incluso si no tienen sntomas. Use una mscara, mantngase a 6 pies de distancia y lvese las manos.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: English

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: You hear it all the time during flu season: wash your hands to prevent the spread of flu. You may have heard advice encouraging you to do the same to stop the spread of COVID-19. But do you know why this simple practice works so effectively? Washing your hands with soap and water breaks up the molecules of the virus and washes them away, preventing the virus from infecting you or others.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To be able to effectively and reliably break up the virus cells, you must wash your hands thoroughly and vigorously for at least 20 seconds. Doing this can be incredibly effective! In fact, a study showed that when a group of elementary aged school children participated in supervised handwashing 2-4 times per day, the spread of a similar virus was reduced by 47%

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: While it is important to wash your hands, it is also important that we all regularly disinfect surfaces.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: COVID-19 has been shown to live for up to three days on various surfaces. If you must leave your home for essential services, be sure to wash your hands as soon as you return and disinfect any surfaces you may have touched. If someone in your home is ill, its also important to regularly disinfect. Applying soap and water plus commonly used disinfectants to frequently touched surfaces will break up the virus and carry it away, in the same way soap kills and carries away the virus on your hands.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We hope you and your family are able to regularly take these simple steps, which will help prevent the spread of COVID-19, and help your family to stay well. For more information on preventing the spread of COVID-19, visit

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Espaol

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

div.p: Lo escucha todo el tiempo durante la temporada de gripe: lvese las manos para prevenir la propagacin de la gripe. Es posible que haya escuchado consejos que le recomiendan a hacer lo mismo para detener la propagacin del COVID-19. Pero, sabe por qu esta simple prctica funciona tan bien? Lavarse las manos con agua y jabn divide las molculas del virus y las elimina, evitando que el virus lo contagie a usted u otras personas.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

div.p: Para poder dividir de manera eficaz y confiable las clulas del virus, debe lavarse las manos intensamente y energticamente durante al menos 20 segundos. Hacer esto puede ser increblemente eficaz! De hecho, un estudio demostr que cuando un grupo de nios de primaria en edad escolar participaba en el lavado supervisado de manos de 2 a 4 veces al da, la propagacin de un virus similar se redujo en un 47%.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

div.p: Si bien es importante lavarse las manos, tambin es importante desinfectar regularmente las superficies alrededor de su hogar. Se ha demostrado que el COVID-19 vive hasta tres das en varias superficies. Piense en todas las cosas en su hogar que usted y su familia tocan varias veces al da: manija de puertas, interruptores de luz, manijas de grifos, encimeras, muebles y ms. Si toca un objeto o una superficie que alguien acaba de tocar con el virus en sus manos, el virus ahora podra estar en sus manos. Aplicar jabn y agua ms desinfectantes comunes en estas superficies dividir el virus y lo eliminar, de la misma manera que el jabn mata y elimina el virus de las manos.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

div.p: Esperamos que usted y su familia puedan tomar regularmente estos dos simples pasos, que ayudarn a prevenir la propagacin del COVID-19 y ayudarn a que su familia se mantenga bien. Para obtener ms informacin sobre cmo prevenir la propagacin del COVID-19, visite www.tea.texas.gov/staywell.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: English

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: From the Staff at Center Point ISD. We miss our students and hope you are all well. This important message about COVID-19 will help to keep you safe and healthy. The most important thing you can do right now is stay at home! If thats not possible, practice social distancing by staying 6 feet from others. Wash your hands with soap and water for 20 seconds and disinfect frequently touched surfaces such as doorknobs and countertops. Avoid touching your eyes, nose, or mouth, and cover a cough or sneeze with your elbow. If you have symptoms of COVID-19 a fever, dry cough, or shortness of breath, call your doctor. Remember, by staying apart now, we can all be together again faster!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Espaol

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 20px;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Del personal de Center Point ISD. Extraamos a nuestros estudiantes y esperamos que todos estn bien. Este importante mensaje sobre COVID-19 lo ayudar a mantenerse seguro y saludable. Lo ms importante que puede hacer ahora es quedarse en casa! Si eso no es posible, practique el distanciamiento social mantenindose a 6 pies de distancia de los dems. Lvese las manos con agua y jabn durante 20 segundos y desinfecte las superficies que se tocan con frecuencia, como los pomos de las puertas y las encimeras. Evite tocarse los ojos, la nariz o la boca, y cubra la tos o estornude con el codo. Si tiene sntomas de COVID-19: fiebre, tos seca o falta de aire, llame a su mdico. Recuerde, al permanecer separados ahora, todos podemos estar juntos nuevamente ms rpido!

p.span: The Center Point ISD community must work together to fight COVID-19. Head to

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: for vitally important public health guidance to stop the spread. If we stand apart as a community now, we will be together again soon.
